The reference P was not found in the current environment.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) H, H0 : poly A0 eqA ltM Unable to unify "plusP ?M1860 ?M1861 ?M1862 ?M1863 ?M1865 ?M1866 ?M1868 ?M1869 (pluspf ?M1861 ?M1863 ?M1864 ?M1867 ?M1868 ?M1869)" with "{a : list (Term A n) | canonical A0 eqA ltM a}".

original: intros P Q H. intros p1 p2 H0. apply plusP_inv1 with (a:=P) (t1:=p1) (t2:=p2) in H. apply plusP_inv2 with (a:=P) (t1:=p1) (t2:=p2) in H0. apply pluspf_is_plusP. split. - apply H. - apply H0.
